column4: hello, what is the easiest way to install the latest version of ruby on ubuntu 11.04?
Ok 1.9.1 is installing, do you know if there's a command to upgrade to 1.9.3 or do I have to download/install it manually?
you'll likely have to compile by hand or look for a ppa. but if you are using a 1.9 you'll probably end up compiling other libraries by hand as well
